The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 06 September is 3,035 (351.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 September, there were 57 new confirmed cases (6.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 August, there were 53 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (4 extra cases).
